Tender Announcement: Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services
==============================================

Tender Title: Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services
---------------------------------------------------------

### Overview
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services in the Kingston Census Metropolitan Area.

### Key Details
* Tender Reference Number: cb-8748-89389533
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: 21401-27-4502247
* Publication Date: 2023-09-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-05T14:00:00 (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

### Description
This requirement is for the provision of Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) in the Kingston Census Metropolitan Area. The services will be required for the provision of essential health care and reasonable access to non-essential mental health care for offenders.

### Objectives
The objectives of this requirement are:

1. To provide Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services to offenders in the region.
2. To meet CSC’s mandate to implement primary health care and essential health services at all stages of an offender’s sentence.
3. To provide services in accordance with acceptable professional medical standards and relevant regulatory requirements.

### Deliverables
The Contractor will be required to provide the following services:

* Offsite Diagnostic Imaging (Ultrasound) Services to offender populations from institutions in the Kingston CMA.
* Services will be provided on an as-and-when-needed basis, focusing on priority groups.
* The Contractor will provide all necessary equipment and radiological services, in accordance with provincial and regulatory requirements.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the lowest price method.
